description: Learn the fundamentals of web development, including HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

videoData.title: Introduction to Web Development
videoData.description: An introduction to the basics of web development, covering HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

videoData.title: HTML Basics
videoData.description: Learn the fundamentals of HTML, the backbone of web content.

videoData.title: CSS Basics
videoData.description: An overview of CSS, the language used to style HTML content.

videoData.title: JavaScript Basics
videoData.description: Learn the fundamentals of JavaScript, the language of interactivity on the web.

videoData.title: Advanced HTML & CSS
videoData.description: Deep dive into more advanced HTML and CSS concepts and techniques.

videoData.title: JavaScript Advanced Concepts
videoData.description: Explore advanced JavaScript concepts and techniques.

videoData.title: Web Development Tools
videoData.description: Overview of essential tools used in web development.

videoData.title: Project: Building a Simple Website
videoData.description: A hands-on project where we build a simple website from scratch.

videoData.title: Responsive Design
videoData.description: Learn the principles of responsive design to make your website look great on all devices.

videoData.title: Deploying Your Website
videoData.description: A guide on how to deploy your website to the internet.

videoData.title: Maintaining a Website
videoData.description: Best practices for maintaining and updating your website post-launch.

videoData.title: Course Summary & Next Steps
videoData.description: Wrapping up the course and discussing next steps for further learning.
